story.storykicker: The Assam Class 12 board results have been declared today, i.e. June 2, on its official website resultsassam.nic.in.
story.storybody:
The Assam Education Board has declared the Class 12 examination results today, i.e. June 2, on its official website.

All the candidates can check the results on the official website, the link for which is, http://resultsassam.nic.in/.

Assam board conducted the examination in March and was concluded on April 23.

Due to the announcement of the assembly polls scheduled by the Election Commission, CBSE rescheduled the dates of Class 12 examination held in West Bengal and Assam.

Steps to check the results:

  • All the candidates need to log on to the official website, www.ahsec.nic.in
  • Click on relevant link
  • Enter the roll number and name
  • Click to submit
  • The results will be displayed
  • All the candidates are advised to take a print out of the same for future reference

About Assam Board:

Established on June 1, 1984, the Assam Higher Secondary Education Council aims at regulating, supervising and developing the system of Higher Secondary Education in the state of Assam.

 

Read: Intel competition in US awards six Indian students

For exam related news click here.
